Anyone know if this will work with a Legit steam copy of Skyrim/Dawnguard, and what the process would be to continue playing?

@chewie -- IT should work fine just place the esm and bsa file into yor install folder and be sure to activate the esm in your launcher -- As far as the game is concerned it is just another mod so wouldn't matter if it is a legit Steam version or a cracked game !

Just tried opening the esm in the construction kit and it says it is missing the Strings file that should be located in DataStringsHearthFires_english.Strings So this is missing some of the files for the DLC !

Ignore the above comment about missing things -- the Strings are inside the BSA just the CK was not finding them ( I think the BSA needs to be registered in the config file or as I did unpacked in order to be used by the CK ) - I unpacked the BSA file and it now loads fine in the ck (several error reports but those are pretty normal for this game and the CK !)
